metadata.name: Kevin Thomas

persona.name: Sofia Nguyen
persona.role: Operations Lead, e-commerce warehouse (30 staff, high uptime needs)
persona.goal: Add a backup connection and confirm best-fit business internet plan; schedule a callback
persona.context: Shipping scanners and cloud systems fail during outages; experienced a recent downtime event and needs a solution quickly

intent.name: Check Availability at a Business Address
intent.description: A new prospect wants to confirm serviceability for a specific business location before proceeding.
intent.goal: Provide the next step to verify address and schedule a callback to complete qualification.
intent.initialMessage: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?

emotion.name: Skeptical
emotion.description: Challenges claims, asks for proof or confirmation, references past bad experiences, and questions pricing or reliability.

metadata.outcome: Appointment confirmed and basic pre-call info requested.

turns.content: Can you tell me if service is available at 2450 W Main St, Suite 110?
I can check availability for that address. Could you share your first and last name, please?

messages: I can check availability for that address. Could you share your first and last name, please?

turns.content:
Sofia Nguyen.  

And just to be clear, this is for a business warehouse, not residential.
Thanks, Sofia. This is for a business, right? What date, time, and timezone work best for a quick call with our Business Class agent?

messages: Thanks, Sofia. This is for a business, right? What date, time, and timezone work best for a quick call with our Business Class agent?

turns.content:
Yeah, business only. I’m the ops lead for our warehouse.  

Earliest I can do is tomorrow at 2:30 pm Eastern. I need someone who can talk backup connectivity and realistic install timelines, not just sales pitches.
Great, you're all set for January 14, 2026, 2:30 PM ET. You’ll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with today?

messages: Great, you're all set for January 14, 2026, 2:30 PM ET. You’ll get a text with the phone number to call about 5 minutes before your appointment. Anything else I can help with today?

turns.content:
Okay. Before I jump on another sales call, can you confirm two things:  
1) Do you actually support dual-WAN/backup setups for business, or is that something I’d have to manage completely on my own?  
2) What’s the typical install window for a new line at a warehouse—are we talking days or weeks?  

If you can at least give me ballpark answers, I’ll be ready with more specific questions on the call.
